entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley's diet isn't going too well.

entities.name: aunt
entities.description: My aunt found him smuggling doughnuts into his room yesterday

entities.name: playstation
entities.description: That's a sort of computer thing you can play games on.

entities.name: mega-mutilation part three
entities.description: Bit stupid really, now he hasn't even got Mega-Mutilation Part Three to take his mind off things

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: I'm okay, mainly because the Dursleys are terrified you might turn up and turn them all into bats if I ask you to.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: My scar hurt again. Last time that happened it was because Voldemort was at Hogwarts.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: But I don't reckon he can be anywhere near me now, can he?

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: I'll send this with Hedwig when she gets back; she's off hunting at the moment.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Say hello to Buckbeak for me
